name: Sergei the Bear
description:
The game is inspired by classic Point & Click adventure games like LucasArts' Monkey Island. The story is about a man who ends up in a Gulag-like camp and tries to escape it.

A game project for my final year in university so it's rather short. Still in progress of fixing some bugs but it's playable.

There are english words written in Russian letters and there are a couple of Russian words:

Privet - hello, Muzhik - man/Russian peasant, Novichok - newbie, Kolbasa - sausage, Klichki - nicknames.
